articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: Proteas Women to host New Zealand in ODI and T20 series
articles.description: Cricket South Africa has announced that New Zealand will tour these shores later this year for limited overs series against the Proteas Women.
articles.content:
• New Zealand's women's cricket team will tour South Africa later this year.
  • The Proteas Women will tackle the White Ferns in three ODIs and five T20Is.
  • The series will take pla… [+3390 chars]

articles.author: RIO YAMAT and RICK BOWMER Associated Press
articles.title: Blood-red crickets invade Nevada town, residents fight back with brooms, leaf blowers, snow plows
articles.description: The small town of Elko in rural northeastern Nevada is being invaded by a swarm of blood-red crickets
articles.content: ELKO, Nev. -- Dana Dolan was driving through her small Nevada hometown when she thought she had come upon a gory crash. The ground surrounding Elko's stretch of Interstate 80 looked as if it had been… [+4981 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
